9 Nine Readings Are Assigned To The Easter Vigil: Seven From The Old Testament And Two From The New. If Circumstances 
Demand In Individual Cases, The Number Of Prescribed Readings May Be Reduced. Three Selections From The Old Testament, 
Both From The Law And The Prophets, Should Be Read Before The Epistle And Gospel. In Any Case, The Reading From Exodus 
About The Escape Through The Red Sea (Reading 3) Should Never Be Omitted.
